title: Slide, A mule train on an upgrade "Golly! Where is dis yere promis land", 20th century
title_raw: A mule train on an upgrade "Golly! Where is dis yere promis land"
description: Hand-colored sketch of Negroes pushing and pulling mule up a hill. Designer: Currier & Ives. Manufacturer: T. H. McAllister & Co. 49 Nassau St. NYC
